examples.example: 即便下雨也阻挡不了我愉快地出门享受生活。

translate.english: Even if it rains, it can't stop me from happily going out to enjoy life.

examples.example: 下雨的时候，我喜欢坐在窗边聆听雨滴落下的美妙声音。

translate.english: When it is raining, I like to sit by the window and listen to the wonderful sound of raindrops falling.

examples.example: 每当下雨的时候，我总喜欢泡一杯热茶，静静地欣赏窗外的雨景。

translate.english: Whenever it rains, I always like to make a cup of hot tea and quietly enjoy the rain scene outside the window.
